pr_title: #986 Fixing codegen's unit- and integration tests on Windows systems

timeline.bodyText: This changelog is actually auto generated. You can add a new entry by running the scripts/new-change script and following the instructions, and then commit the new file created by the script in .changes/next-release with your changes.
timeline.author: zoewangg

replies.bodyText: My bad, I didn't even fully read a paragraph regarding this script in contribution guide since I thought that this is optional... Fixed this and slightly modified the guide itself to highlight the fact that script usage is mandatory (hopefully it's OK to do this in this PR and not in the scope of a separate issue).
replies.author: Alexander-Kiselyov

timeline.message:
Ensure build works for Windows #986

Adding convenience method that allows to replace '\n' characters with the platform-dependent ones and applying it to affected test data.
Supplementing CHANGELOG.MD with changes' description. Clarifying necessity of using the new-change script for such actions.
